original_text: Nevertheless man being in honour abideth not: he is like the beasts that perish.
korean_text: 사람은 존귀하나 장구하지 못함이여 멸망하는 짐승 같도다

sentences.original_text: Nevertheless man being in honour abideth not:
sentences.korean_translation: 그럼에도 불구하고 존귀에 있는 사람은 머무르지 않으니

sentences.original_text: he is like the beasts that perish.
